item.title: Android Dev - System UI has stopped working
item.description: Alright, my first post will be about something that took me way too much time to fix. Find a TLDR version at the end of it. For about a month or so I’ve been working on an Android/REST project. Working with people that were new to Android, I had a great pleasure letting them doing things that bores me, like XML layouts, and basic design - including creating background images, and a logo.
